one_day_reward.name: Reach Level (Lv. 40)
one_day_reward.description: After creating a character, if you reach Lv. 40 you can get a reward for that level once.

one_day_reward.name: Reach Level (Lv. 45)
one_day_reward.description: After creating a character, if you reach Lv. 45 you can get a reward for that level once.

one_day_reward.name: Reach Level (Lv. 50)
one_day_reward.description: After creating a character, if you reach Lv. 50 you can get a reward for that level once.

one_day_reward.name: Reach Level (Lv. 55)
one_day_reward.description: After creating a character, if you reach Lv. 55 you can get a reward for that level once.

one_day_reward.name: Reach Level (Lv. 60)
one_day_reward.description: After creating a character, if you reach Lv. 60 you can get a reward for that level once.

one_day_reward.name: Reach Level (Lv. 65)
one_day_reward.description: After creating a character, if you reach Lv. 65 you can get a reward for that level once.

one_day_reward.name: Reach Level (Lv. 68)
one_day_reward.description: After creating a character, if you reach Lv. 68 you can get a reward for that level once.

one_day_reward.name: Reach Level (Lv. 71)
one_day_reward.description: After creating a character, if you reach Lv. 71 you can get a reward for that level once.

one_day_reward.name: Reach Level (Lv. 74)
one_day_reward.description: After creating a character, if you reach Lv. 74 you can get a reward for that level once.

one_day_reward.name: Reach Level (Lv. 76 Wizard only)
one_day_reward.description: After creating a character, if you reach Lv. 76 you can get a reward for that level once.

one_day_reward.name: Reach Level (Lv. 78)
one_day_reward.description: After creating a character, if you reach Lv. 78 you can get a reward for that level once.

one_day_reward.name: Reach Level (Lv. 80)
one_day_reward.description: After creating a character, if you reach Lv. 80 you can get a reward for that level once.

one_day_reward.name: Login Once During the Weekend
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you login once during the weekend.

one_day_reward.name: Login Once During the Month
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you login once during the month.

one_day_reward.name: Quest Mania
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you complete any two quests.

one_day_reward.name: Skilful Fisherman
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you fish five times, regardless of the result.

one_day_reward.name: Join the Clan!
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you join a clan.

one_day_reward.name: Participate in 1 Olympiad Match!
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you participate in 1 Olympiad match, regardless of the result.

one_day_reward.name: Participate in 10 Olympiad Matches!
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you participate in 10 Olympiad matches, regardless of the result.

one_day_reward.name: Participate in 30 Olympiad Matches!
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you participate in 30 Olympiad matches, regardless of the result.

one_day_reward.name: Win 15 Olympiad Matches!
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you win 15 Olympiad matches.

one_day_reward.name: Explore the Devil's Isle!
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill 100 monsters on the Devil's Isle.

one_day_reward.name: Defeat Zaken!
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you take part in Zaken Raid. You must be in the Command Channel that defeats Zaken.

one_day_reward.name: Participate in the Siege!
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you are a member of the clan that is registered for the siege and you are logged in when the siege starts.

one_day_reward.name: Enchant Item!
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you enchant at least 1 item, regardless of the outcome.

one_day_reward.name: Daily Hunting (Lv. 20 or lower)
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill any 30 monsters. Monsters that are level 6 or lower than the character are not counted.

one_day_reward.name: Daily Hunting (Lv. 21-40)
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill any 30 monsters. Monsters that are level 6 or lower than the character are not counted.

one_day_reward.name: Daily Hunting (Lv. 41-50)
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill any 30 monsters. Monsters that are level 6 or lower than the character are not counted.

one_day_reward.name: Daily Hunting (Lv. 51-60)
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill any 30 monsters. Monsters that are level 6 or lower than the character are not counted.

one_day_reward.name: Daily Hunting (Lv. 61-70)
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill any 30 monsters. Monsters that are level 6 or lower than the character are not counted.

one_day_reward.name: Daily Hunting (Lv. 71-75)
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill any 30 monsters. Monsters that are level 6 or lower than the character are not counted.

one_day_reward.name: Daily Hunting (Lv. 76 or higher)
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill any 30 monsters. Monsters that are level 6 or lower than the character are not counted.

one_day_reward.name: Weekly Hunting (Lv. 20 or lower)
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill any 100 monsters. Monsters that are level 6 or lower than the character are not counted.

one_day_reward.name: Weekly Hunting (Lv. 21-40)
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill any 150 monsters. Monsters that are level 6 or lower than the character are not counted.

one_day_reward.name: Weekly Hunting (Lv. 41-50)
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill any 200 monsters. Monsters that are level 6 or lower than the character are not counted.

one_day_reward.name: Weekly Hunting (Lv. 51-60)
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill any 250 monsters. Monsters that are level 6 or lower than the character are not counted.

one_day_reward.name: Weekly Hunting (Lv. 61-70)
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill any 300 monsters. Monsters that are level 6 or lower than the character are not counted.

one_day_reward.name: Weekly Hunting (Lv. 71-75)
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill any 400 monsters. Monsters that are level 6 or lower than the character are not counted.

one_day_reward.name: Weekly Hunting (Lv. 76 or higher)
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill any 500 monsters. Monsters that are level 6 or lower than the character are not counted.

one_day_reward.name: Expedition on the Forgotten Island
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill any 300 monsters on the Forgotten Island. You can complete the quest for this reward only once. For characters that reached Lv. 74 or higher.

one_day_reward.name: Special Daily Hunting (Lv. 76+)
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill 100 monsters from the list in Hot Springs: Ruler of Hot Springs Hot Springs Yeti, Hot Springs Buffalo, Hot Springs Grendel.

one_day_reward.name: Defeat Core!
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you take part in Core Raid. You must be in the Command Channel that defeats Core.

one_day_reward.name: Earth Hunting Guide
one_day_reward.description: Go to the Earth Attribute Hinting Ground and attack monsters with Wind Attribute to deal them more damage.\n(Earth Attribute Hinting Ground: Wall of Argos)\nAfter completion, the Hunting Guide will continue.

one_day_reward.name: Water Hunting Guide
one_day_reward.description: Go to the Water Attribute Hinting Ground and attack monsters with Earth Attribute to deal them more damage.\n(Water Attribute Hinting Ground: Garden of Eva)\nAfter completion, the Hunting Guide will continue.

one_day_reward.name: Fire Hunting Guide
one_day_reward.description: Go to the Fire Attribute Hinting Ground and attack monsters with water Attribute to deal them more damage.\n(Fire Attribute Hinting Ground: Forge of Gods)\nAfter completion, the Hunting Guide will continue.

one_day_reward.name: Attribute monsters hunting
one_day_reward.description: Receive it once a week for Attribute monster hunting.

one_day_reward.name: Exploration of Giant's Cave
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill 200 monsters at the top and lower levels of the Giant's Cave ex—Åept the Giant's Cave entrance.\n(For characters that reached Lv. 76 or higher.)

one_day_reward.name: Exploration of Forgotten Island
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill 200 monsters in inner part of Forgotten Island. \n(For characters that reached Lv. 78 or higher.)

one_day_reward.name: Exploration of Varka Silenos Barracks
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill 300 monsters in Varka Silenos Barracks. (For characters that reached Lv. 78 or higher.)

one_day_reward.name: Exploration of Ketra Orc Outpost
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill 300 monsters in Ketra Orc Outpost. (For characters that reached Lv. 78 or higher.)

one_day_reward.name: Killing of Spirit King Ignis
one_day_reward.description: You can get a reward once for killing of Spirit King Ignis in his residence 10 times. (Only for characters that reached Lv. 76 and higher).

one_day_reward.name: Killing of Spirit Queen Nebula
one_day_reward.description: You can get a reward once for killing of Spirit Queen Nebula in her Residence 10 times. (Only for characters that reached Lv. 76 and higher).

one_day_reward.name: Killing of Spirit King Procella
one_day_reward.description: You can get a reward once for killing of Spirit King Procella in his Residence 10 times. (Only for characters that reached Lv. 76 and higher).

one_day_reward.name: Killing of Spirit King Petram
one_day_reward.description: You can get a reward once for killing of Spirit King Petram in his Residence 10 times. (Only for characters that reached Lv. 76 and higher).

one_day_reward.name: Reach Level (Lv. 85)
one_day_reward.description: After creating a character, if you reach Lv. 85 you can get a reward for that level once.

one_day_reward.name: Reach Level (Lv. 86)
one_day_reward.description: After creating a character, if you reach Lv. 86 you can get a reward for that level once.

one_day_reward.name: Exploration of Imperial Tomb
one_day_reward.description: Receive it when you kill 500 monsters in Imperial Tomb.\n(For characters that reached Lv. 78 or higher.)

one_day_reward.name: Hero's way I
one_day_reward.description: When you reach Lv. 80, you will get 1 special token for learning certification skill.

one_day_reward.name: Hero's way II
one_day_reward.description: When you reach Lv. 81, you will get 1 special token for learning certification skill.

one_day_reward.name: Hero's way III
one_day_reward.description: When you reach Lv. 82, you will get 1 special token for learning certification skill.

one_day_reward.name: Hero's way IV
one_day_reward.description: When you reach Lv. 83, you will get 1 special token for learning certification skill.

one_day_reward.name: Hero's way V
one_day_reward.description: When you reach Lv. 84, you will get 1 special token for learning certification skill.

one_day_reward.name: Hero's way VI
one_day_reward.description: When you reach Lv. 85, you will get 1 special token for learning certification skill.

one_day_reward.name: Hero's way VII
one_day_reward.description: When you reach Lv. 86, you will get 1 special token for learning certification skill.
